items.content_html: Fullstack web application created with ReactJS on the front-end, Java Spring Boot on the back-end and using PostgreSQL database. Lightweight application meant to showcase the use of CRUD operations from web interface created by ReactJS all the way to database with the help of Java Spring Boot.
